sj224.tflp.dice

Class Dice

  • java.lang.Object
    • sj224.tflp.dice.Dice

  • public class Dice
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has additional static methods for manipulating dice.

    Johnathan Waugh

      • rollOf

        public static Die rollOf(int n,
                         Die d)
        Create a Die object for simulating the roll of several of the same kind of die
        Parameters:
        d - The kind of die to be rolled
        n - The number of dice to be rolled
        Returns:
        A Die object to simulate rolling the specified set of dice
